titles.title: TRIO Education Access Act of 2002
To amend section 402A of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to define the terms different campus and different population.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 5/1/2002--Introduced. TRIO Education Access Act of 2002 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide definitions of different campus and different population for purposes of Federal TRIO programs for disadvantaged students.
